publ: by 深圳市涞顿科技有限公司
name: LeydenVolt
0:
”Alexa, turn on the AC output.”
”Alexa, turn off the AC output.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
You can simply ask Alexa to control your Leyden portable power station. After connecting Alexa to your products in a few simple steps:
(1). Download our LeydenVolt app in app market then register an account;
(2). Configure our devices in our LeydenVolt app and change appropriate name for your devices;
(3). Download Amazon "Alexa" app from android,ios or Amazon app market then configure Echo with "Alexa" app;
(4). Search LeydenVolt skill from the "Alexa" app skills category;
(5). Enable LeydenVolt skill, and you'll be navigated to LeydenVolt login page;
(6). Follow the instructions on the page to complete linking;
(7). Now all setup is finished. You can enjoy the voice control on your home devices like these:
“Alexa, turn on the AC output.”
“Alexa, turn off the AC output .”
“Alexa, turn on the DC output.”
“Alexa, turn off the DC output .”
“Alexa, turn on the DC5521 output.”
“Alexa, turn off the DC5521 output .”
“Alexa, turn on the USB output.”
“Alexa, turn off the USB output .”
“Alexa, turn on buzzer.”
“Alexa, turn off buzzer.”
“Alexa, turn on EPS mode.”
“Alexa, turn off EPS mode.”
“Alexa, turn on Long standby mode.”
“Alexa, turn off Long standby mode.”
“Alexa, turn on smart overload mode.”
“Alexa, turn off smart overload mode.”
“Alexa, turn on smart car charger.”
“Alexa, turn off smart car charger.”
“Alexa, set bat fastcharge power 5 Ratios.”
“Alexa, set max charger percent 95%.”
“Alexa, set recharge time 45 day.”
